backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file describing two frontend feature requirements and their associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing metadata and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the RoseDayPage.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/Closing: Modal component showing decorated personal note content triggered by a button.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RevealN: Accordion component that toggles visibility of note content.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/Section: Sticky navigation bar enabling smooth scrolling between page sections.
frontend/src/content/roseDayContent.ts: Defines content variants including hero, note, reasons, closing, and popup text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and managing query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentVariant.ts: Hook selecting content variant based on URL query parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status handling. Manages AuthClient creation, loading stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: React hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollFadeIn.ts: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to reveal elements with a fade-in effect, with instant visibility when reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode values, typography, scroll behavior, reduced motion rules, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/RoseDayPage.tsx: Page component rendering the Rose Day experience with fade-in sections, themed images, hero text, navigation, and personalized romantic content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from CSS variables, adding plugins, custom fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s purpose, features, requirements, and current state for building a personalized Rose Day gift website.
